507990.name: Robotpencil Presents: Character Portrait Demo
507990.description:
In-depth Face Painting Demo. This video is around 45 minutes long talking about how I usually paint my character designs faces. Topics covered include.

-Get the shape of the head.
-Find the features of the face
-Determine their character
-Flavor it with some design.
507990.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言

categories.description: 原生支持 Steam 控制器
